definition: -ly/structural particle: used before a verb or adjective, linking it to preceding modifying adverbial adjunct

sentences.english: Now, Tzu Chi Earth, our weekly guide to Tzu Chi's chapters and offices around the world.
sentences.chinese: 现在，又到了慈济地球村，带你认识全球慈济各支会。

sentences.english: We are all the villagers, the village is a family.
sentences.chinese: 我们都是地球村的村民，天南海北都是一家人。

sentences.english: Therefor, namely given "global village" this nickname.
sentences.chinese: 因之，即赋予了“地球村”这一爱称。

sentences.english: It does not appear to belong to or benefit the majority of the world's citizens.
sentences.chinese: 看来它并不属于也不加惠地球村多数的公民。

sentences.english: Yangshuo, which is known as the miniature of the world, gathered foreigners from all over the world.
sentences.chinese: 这里老外云集，可以说是一个地道的地球村的缩影。

sentences.english: We know poetry is a vital force in the global community.
sentences.chinese: 我们深知诗歌是地球村的有生力量。

sentences.english: The world is smaller and smaller, as the global village is inevitable.
sentences.chinese: 世界越来越小，地球村势在必然。

sentences.english: The global village would at last have been realized.
sentences.chinese: 地球村就这样终于实现了。

definition: without borders (used for organizations such as Médecins sans Frontières)
One world - one dream, motto of 2008 Beijing Olympic games
pinyin: tong2 yi1 ge4 shi4 jie4 , tong2 yi1 ge4 meng4 xiang3
related.word: 同一个世界，同一个梦想

definition: Thucydides trap (theory that war results when a dominant established power fears the rise of a rival power)
pinyin: Xiu1 xi1 di3 de2 xian4 jing3

definition: variant of 因特網|因特网[Yin1 te4 wang3], Internet
